title: Pulsefire Ezreal Icon missing?
body:
It was my understanding that if you had the Puslfire Ez skin you would also have the icon, it is still yet to update on my account.

Could someone look into this for me?

regards,

Orsimderst

replies.body: I also don't have my icon :) got puls ez for about year

bump
same issue here, have the time portal icon but not the new pulsefire ezreal icon. if a rioter could check and add it to my account it would be greatly appreciated.
We've wrapped out distributing those icons, sorry for the delay!  Not sure who you were missed but I've added it to your account.  Thanks for letting us know!
